summary: New version of Good Vision ENB for Skyrim with ENB binary v0.241m and better performance
descriptionHtml:
Video on YouTube
[youtube]VYqojypEb40[/youtube] [youtube]YHPp-s2FKoM[/youtube]


Download the ENB 0.241 binary first !

Good Vision ENB V2 is the the second version of Good Vision ENB. High quality preset for ENB mod with very good performance and looking.
INSTALATION

1. Deactivate AA / SSAO in game settings AND/OR over videodriver

2. Copy all files files from my ENB to Skyrim main folder

3. Copy d3d9.dll by Boris Vorontsov to Skyrim main folder

Recommended mods:

-Lens Textures for ENB by amoebae
-Skyrim HD - 2K Textures by NebuLa
-Skyrim Flora Overhaul bu Vurt


My PC:
-Intel Pentium Dual Core 2.5GHZ
-ATI Radeon Asus HD5770 1 GB DDR5 CU Core
-3GB DDR2 RAM


Credits:
-Boris Vorntsov for create ENB mod
-Amoebae for great Lens textures
-NebuLa for 2K Textures
-Vurt for Flora Overhaul
-Kyokushinoyama for shaders
author: Ghost
